mapper.insert: insert into `clienttrace` (name, email, qq, tel, current_state_id, trace_man_id, nextTraceDate, intention_school_id, intention_class_id, communicative_purpose_id, communicative_way_id, degree_of_intention_id, lastTraceDate, traceTimes, contentAbstract, communicationContent, status) values (#{name.id}, #{email}, #{qq}, #{tel}, #{currentState.id}, #{traceMan.id}, #{nextTraceDate}, #{intentionSchool.id}, #{intentionClass.id}, #{communicativePurpose.id}, #{communicativeWay.id}, #{degreeOfIntention.id}, #{lastTraceDate}, #{traceTimes}, #{contentAbstract}, #{communicationContent}, #{status})
mapper.update: update `clienttrace` set name = #{name.id}, email = #{email}, qq = #{qq}, tel = #{tel}, current_state_id = #{currentState.id}, trace_man_id = #{traceMan.id}, nextTraceDate = #{nextTraceDate}, intention_school_id = #{intentionSchool.id}, intention_class_id = #{intentionClass.id}, communicative_purpose_id = #{communicativePurpose.id}, communicative_way_id = #{communicativeWay.id}, degree_of_intention_id = #{degreeOfIntention.id}, lastTraceDate = #{lastTraceDate}, traceTimes = #{traceTimes}, contentAbstract = #{contentAbstract}, communicationContent = #{communicationContent}, status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select c.id,client.id client_id, client.name client_name, c.email, c.qq, c.tel, c.current_state_id currentState_id, currentState.name currentState_name, c.trace_man_id trace_man_id,trace_man.username trace_man_username, c.nextTraceDate, c.intention_school_id intentionSchool_id, intentionSchool.name intentionSchool_name, c.intention_class_id intentionClass_id, intentionClass.name intentionClass_name, c.communicative_purpose_id communicativePurpose_id, communicativePurpose.name communicativePurpose_name, c.communicative_way_id communicativeWay_id, communicativeWay.name communicativeWay_name, c.degree_of_intention_id degreeOfIntention_id, degreeOfIntention.name degreeOfIntention_name, c.lastTraceDate, c.traceTimes, c.contentAbstract, c.communication_content, c.status from `clienttrace` c left join employee trace_man on trace_man.id=c.trace_man_id left join client client on c.name=client.id left join datadictionaryitem currentState on c.current_state_id=currentState.id left join datadictionaryitem intentionSchool on c.intention_school_id=intentionSchool.id left join datadictionaryitem intentionClass on c.intention_class_id=intentionClass.id left join datadictionaryitem communicativePurpose on c.communicative_way_id=communicativePurpose.id left join datadictionaryitem communicativeWay on c.communicative_way_id=communicativeWay.id left join datadictionaryitem degreeOfIntention on c.degree_of_intention_id=degreeOfIntention.id where id = #{id}

select id, name, email, qq, tel, current_state_id, trace_man_id, nextTraceDate, intention_school_id, intention_class_id, communicative_purpose_id, communicative_way_id, degree_of_intention_id, lastTraceDate, traceTimes, contentAbstract, communicationContent, status from `clienttrace`

select c.id,client.id client_id, client.name client_name, c.email, c.qq, c.tel, c.current_state_id currentState_id, currentState.name currentState_name, c.trace_man_id trace_man_id,trace_man.username trace_man_username, c.nextTraceDate, c.intention_school_id intentionSchool_id, intentionSchool.name intentionSchool_name, c.intention_class_id intentionClass_id, intentionClass.name intentionClass_name, c.communicative_purpose_id communicativePurpose_id, communicativePurpose.name communicativePurpose_name, c.communicative_way_id communicativeWay_id, communicativeWay.name communicativeWay_name, c.degree_of_intention_id degreeOfIntention_id, degreeOfIntention.name degreeOfIntention_name, c.lastTraceDate, c.traceTimes, c.contentAbstract, c.communication_content, c.status from `clienttrace` c left join employee trace_man on trace_man.id=c.trace_man_id left join client client on c.name=client.id left join datadictionaryitem currentState on c.current_state_id=currentState.id left join datadictionaryitem intentionSchool on c.intention_school_id=intentionSchool.id left join datadictionaryitem intentionClass on c.intention_class_id=intentionClass.id left join datadictionaryitem communicativePurpose on c.communicative_way_id=communicativePurpose.id left join datadictionaryitem communicativeWay on c.communicative_way_id=communicativeWay.id left join datadictionaryitem degreeOfIntention on c.degree_of_intention_id=degreeOfIntention.id limit #{startIndex},#{rows}

select count(c.id) from `clienttrace` c left join employee trace_man on trace_man.id=c.trace_man_id left join client client on c.name=client.id left join datadictionaryitem currentState on c.current_state_id=currentState.id left join datadictionaryitem intentionSchool on c.intention_school_id=intentionSchool.id left join datadictionaryitem intentionClass on c.intention_class_id=intentionClass.id left join datadictionaryitem communicativePurpose on c.communicative_way_id=communicativePurpose.id left join datadictionaryitem communicativeWay on c.communicative_way_id=communicativeWay.id left join datadictionaryitem degreeOfIntention on c.degree_of_intention_id=degreeOfIntention.id
